instructions: Make sure the battery and SIM card are inserted: Insert the battery Insert the SIM card Tap English (United States) if you wish to change the device language. Tap Accessibility if you wish to adjust accessibility settings. Tap Next . If desired, select the Wi-Fi checkbox to turn on Wi-Fi and select a network. Tap Next . Use Tap & Go to copy Google accounts and data from a previous device or tap Skip . Log in to your existing Google account or create a new one. Review the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, then tap ACCEPT . Adjust Date & time settings if needed, them tap NEXT . If offered, you may choose to restore from the backup of another device, then tap NEXT . Select or clear check boxes for the following settings: Back up your phone's apps, app data, settings, and Wi-Fi passwords Use Google's location service Help improve location services Help improve your Android experience Tap Next . If desired, set the phone name and lost phone number contact, then tap Next . If desired, set the Knock Code or tap Skip . Select a Home touch button combination, then tap Next .
